alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 25 at 5:30PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A Wind Advisory remains in effect... * Trade winds over American Samoa are expected to produce winds up to 30 mph with higher gusts. * TIMING...through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Expect possible downed tree limbs as well as shifting of loose and unsecured small objects due to strong winds. Gusty winds will make driving difficult and may cause hazardous conditions for mariners. FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 530 AOAULI ASO TOANA`I IUNI 25 2022 ...O loo faaauau Fautuaga mo Savili Malolosi... * O le a tumau pea le malolosi o savili o le tuaoloa i luga o Amerika Samoa e oo atu i le 30 mph ma e agi faata`uta`u.... * TAIMI...seia oo i le taeao i le Aso Sa. * NOFOAGA AAFIA...E pau`u ai laau lelea ai mea-totino e le`i faamaumauina ma faaleagaina ai apa ma taualuga o fale. Savili malolosi e mafai ona faafaigata ai ona faafoe ai taavale, ae maise lava taavale maualuluga. E sousou foi le sami ona o le malolosi o savili. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA...
info.instruction: A wind advisory means that winds of 30 MPH are expected. Winds This strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
